courseName: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
description: A four-year degree program that focuses on the study of computer systems, networks, and software applications used in various industries, with an emphasis on practical skills and real-world applications.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering
description: A four-year degree program that deals with the study and application of electricity, electronics, and electromagnetism, with a focus on the design, development, and testing of electrical and electronic systems and components.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering
description: A four-year degree program that covers the principles of physics, materials science, and engineering design, with applications in the analysis, design, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems and components.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering
description: A four-year degree program that focuses on the design, construction, and maintenance of infrastructure projects, such as buildings, bridges, roads, and water supply systems, with a strong emphasis on structural analysis and environmental sustainability.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
description: A four-year degree program that provides a broad understanding of business principles, practices, and operations, including management, marketing, finance, accounting, and economics.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Accountancy
description: A four-year degree program that prepares students for careers in accounting, auditing, taxation, and financial management, with a focus on accounting principles, financial reporting, and regulatory compliance.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Education
description: A four-year degree program that trains students to become effective teachers, covering educational theories, teaching methods, classroom management, and subject-specific pedagogy.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Psychology
description: A four-year degree program that explores the scientific study of human behavior, cognition, and mental processes, with applications in various fields such as counseling, research, and human resources.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Business Informatics
description: A four-year degree program that combines business administration and information technology, focusing on the development and management of information systems to support business operations and decision-making.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Biology
description: A four-year degree program that covers the study of living organisms, their structures, functions, and interactions with the environment, with applications in fields such as medicine, biotechnology, and environmental science.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Mathematics
description: A four-year degree program that delves into the study of numbers, patterns, and abstract reasoning, with applications in fields such as finance, engineering, and scientific research.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Physics
description: A four-year degree program that focuses on the study of matter, energy, and the fundamental laws of the universe, with applications in fields such as engineering, astronomy, and research.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Art
description: A four-year degree program that combines the study of visual arts with theoretical and practical training in various art forms, including painting, sculpture, photography, and digital media.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Architecture
description: A four-year degree program that prepares students for careers in the design and construction of buildings and other structures, with a focus on architectural theory, design principles, and sustainable practices.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Chemistry
description: A four-year degree program that explores the study of matter, its properties, and the changes it undergoes, with applications in fields such as pharmaceutical research, materials science, and environmental analysis.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Communication
description: A four-year degree program that covers the study of human communication processes, including interpersonal, organizational, and mass communication, with applications in fields such as public relations, journalism, and marketing.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Criminology and Justice
description: A four-year degree program that examines the causes and consequences of crime, as well as the legal and social systems for addressing criminal behavior, with applications in law enforcement, corrections, and criminal justice reform.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Environmental Science
description: A four-year degree program that integrates the study of physical, biological, and social sciences to understand and address environmental issues, with applications in fields such as conservation, sustainability, and environmental management.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management
description: A four-year degree program that prepares students for careers in the hospitality industry, covering topics such as hotel operations, event planning, tourism management, and customer service.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Computer Animation
description: A four-year degree program that combines the principles of computer science and art, focusing on the creation of animated graphics, visual effects, and interactive multimedia for various industries, including film, video games, and advertising.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Cybersecurity
description: A four-year degree program that focuses on the protection of computer systems, networks, and data from unauthorized access, theft, or damage, with an emphasis on security protocols, risk management, and ethical hacking.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems
description: A four-year degree program that covers the design, development, and management of information systems and technologies, with applications in various industries and organizations.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Advertising
description: A four-year degree program that prepares students for careers in advertising and marketing communications, covering topics such as consumer behavior, creative strategy, media planning, and digital marketing.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Project Management
description: A four-year degree program that focuses on the planning, execution, and control of projects, with an emphasis on team leadership, resource management, risk analysis, and project delivery.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Health Care Administration
description: A four-year degree program that prepares students for leadership roles in the healthcare industry, covering topics such as healthcare policy, operations management, finance, and quality assurance.

courseName: Bachelor of Science in Data Science
description: A four-year degree program that combines statistics, mathematics, computer science, and domain-specific knowledge to extract insights and value from data, with applications in various industries and fields.
